Headline: 63rd-bound Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: 63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Harlem. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
63rd-bound Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier sick customer at Harlem.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Reroute at Ashland/59th
ShortDescription: 9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, 63rd, Racine, 59th and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/59th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Ashland, 63rd, Racine, 59th and Ashland due to street blockage near Ashland/59th.

Allow extra travel time.
